# bst-smart-scholarship-system
Original project requirements:
https://inst-fs-iad-prod.inscloudgate.net/files/3ee34d05-7cbd-48c3-a41c-04b65b9ace1b/Project-425-F2021.pdf?download=1&token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..NfgdpXw4OrmNNXwTkED3mjezZqfQai-trSk4Us-c0QGlja3quR0vD_PcBGFw8QDV3OUVQag6too-yo0XWZJnSw

The project has been refactored to incorporate the iterator design pattern, as shown in this demo: https://youtu.be/Sp8-Kd9ZT0o

How to run the code: [README.docx](https://github.com/paulmeli/bst-smart-scholarship-system/files/8691296/README.docx)
